abstract.p: Metromedia Fiber Network acquires SiteSmith, supplier of hardware and software for Web sites, for about $1.36 billion in stock; graph (S)

block.p: Signaling the growing sophistication of services provided by fiber optic companies, Metromedia Fiber Network agreed to acquire SiteSmith, a supplier of hardware and software for Web sites, for about $1.36 billion in stock. With the acquisition, Metromedia, a provider of fiber optic services based in White Plains, will supply customers with a range of services including unmetered fixed-cost broadband capacity and corporate Internet operations management. SiteSmith shareholders will receive 55 million to 62.5 million Metromedia shares as a result of the transaction. Metromedia's shares fell $2.19, or 10 percent, to $19.63.
